text: Nicolas Cleppe (born 12 December 1995 in Tielt) is a Belgian cyclo-cross and road cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Continental team . ==Major results== ===Cyclo-cross=== ;2016–2017 : 2nd Under-23 race, National Championships ;2018–2019 : Jingle Cross ::1st Race 3 ===Road=== ;2018 : 1st 20px Mountains classification Tour de Wallonie ;2019 : 1st Overall Tour de Liège ::1st Stage 5 : 6th Internationale Wielertrofee Jong Maar Moedig ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian male cyclists
title: Nicolas Cleppe
